content.description: <math alttext="Step 1. O 3, gas, plus C l, gas, react to produce O 2, gas, plus C l O, gas. Step 2. C l O, gas, plus O, gas, react to produce O 2, gas, plus C l, gas" overflow="scroll"> <mtext>Step 1: </mtext> <msub> <mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi> <mn>3</mn> </msub> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>g</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>+</mo> <mi>Cl</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>g</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>→</mo> <msub> <mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>g</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>+</mo> <mi>ClO</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>g</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mspace linebreak="newline"> </mspace> <mtext>Step</mtext> <mspace width="0.25em"> </mspace> <mtext>2: </mtext> <mi>ClO</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>g</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>+</mo> <mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>g</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>→</mo> <msub> <mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msub> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>g</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>+</mo> <mi>Cl</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>g</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </math>
content.question: A proposed mechanism for the destruction of <math alttext="O 3, gas" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math> in the upper atmosphere is represented above. Which of the following is the catalyst in the proposed mechanism?

choices.label: <math alttext="O, gas" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math>
<math alttext="C l, gas" overflow="scroll"><mi>Cl</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math>
<math alttext="C l O, gas" overflow="scroll"><mi>ClO</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="C l, gas" overflow="scroll"><mi>Cl</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math>

skill.text: 1.A: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate particulate-level properties only.
